commit message:
Switch songs synchronously in PlaybackService

Async was causing CoverView to receive the wrong covers in some cases.
Avoid calling getDuration/getPosition when MediaPlayer doesn't want us to

Update cover earlier in CoverView shiftCover

Now that the RemoteException is handled properly we can reorganize this method
to provide a nice boost to responsiveness
Synchronize on mSongTimeline instead of a dedicated object
